name: Mr. Parkour 3
summary:
"Mr. Parkour 3" - the last part of classic 2d parkour game series! Jump over precipices, dangerous enemies and traps on the way to the cherished crystal. 
 
This game follows a proven formula - parkour, juicy music, traps, lasers and several dangerous enemies.. But by the release of the third part of series, the main character has acquired steel shoes that allow you to jump on Bubbles wisps to kill them! Use it wisely and then no one will be able to stop you! Your only friend is yourself, do not trust anything on the levels of the game and move to victory. But don't relax until you reach the last level.. 
 
Game Features: 
31 levels with increasing difficulty 
Old school gameplay 
Pixel art graphics 
Steam Achievements support 
Control your character from both the keyboard and the gamepad
